statements: SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT sale_id, product_id FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT MAX(quantity_sold) FROM Sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC
SELECT sale_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE product_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY sale_id ASC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sold > 50 ORDER BY total_sold DESC
SELECT id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, price FROM sales
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE product_id = 1001
SELECT id, product_id, stock_quantity, last_update_date FROM inventory
SELECT id, product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE id = 1
SELECT product_id, price, quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, price FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id
SELECT inventory.product_id, SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id GROUP BY inventory.product_id
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand > 1000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT inventory.product_id, quantity_in_stock, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity_in_stock < quantity_sold;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10);
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_id, available_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name, quantity_sold from sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id WHERE available_quantity < 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, sale_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_phone) > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_email) > 0;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
